remarks: The ` S. ` integral splits on closed intervals with matching endpoints. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itgspliticc.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
itgspliticc.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
itgspliticc.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A [,] C ) ) $.
itgspliticc.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( A [,] C ) ) -> D e. V ) $.
itgspliticc.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( A [,] B ) |-> D ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgspliticc.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( B [,] C ) |-> D ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgspliticc $p |- ( ph -> S. ( A [,] C ) D _d x = ( S. ( A [,] B ) D _d x + S. ( B [,] C ) D _d x ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
